text: Richard Joseph Neutra (April 8, 1892 â€“ April 16, 1970) was a Jewish Austrian- American architect. His career was set in Southern California. He is seen as one of the most famous modernist architects. ==Works== Image:Gettysburg Cyclorama Building.jpg|Cyclorama Building, Gettysburg, Pennsylvania Image:Jardinette Apartments (Richard Neutra), Hollywood.JPG|Jardinette Apartments, Hollywood Image:Kaufman_House_Palm_Springs.jpg|Kaufmann House, Palm Springs, California.
